titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on e-caprolactone-2-ethyl-2-(hydroxymethyl)-1,3-propanediol polymer.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/8/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on e-caprolactone-2-ethyl-2-(hydroxymethyl)-1,3-propanediol polymer.
